article_title: How The Feds Discourage Prescription Drug Competition

article_metadata.description: There’s a growing refrain among those who pay for healthcare services that they want new products to deliver more value. When it comes to prescription drugs, this is usually interpreted to mean medicines that provide more benefit, at lower costs per increment of clinical advantage. Drugs that deliver more bang [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
